title: Tennessee poll shows a close special election race on GOP turf
shortDescription: A poll shows early voters favor Democratic nominee Aftyn Behn, while those planning to vote on Election Day lean toward GOP nominee Matt Van Epps.

title: Trump's Georgia election case dismissed
shortDescription: A judge dismissed President Donald Trump’s Georgia election interference case after a prosecutor moved to end it.

title: WH Press secretary Karoline Leavitt's nephew's mother detained by ICE
shortDescription: Ferreira was in the final stages of getting her green card, with the last interview scheduled for the spring.

title: Charges dropped against Trump in Georgia election case
shortDescription: State criminal election fraud charges against President Donald Trump in Georgia were dropped at the request of the new prosecutor on the case.

title: Should politicians be allowed to pick their voters?
shortDescription: Redistricting efforts often create funky Congressional maps that advantage one party over another.

title: Trump envoy to visit Russia on heels of leaked call with Kremlin
shortDescription: President Trump's envoy Steve Witkoff will travel next week to Moscow as momentum builds for a peace deal to end the war in Ukraine.

title: Trump lashes out at report on his declining energy, age and stamina
shortDescription: "There will be a day when I run low on energy," President Donald Trump posted after the NYT report on his declining energy. "It certainly is not now!"

title: Trump backs Kash Patel as FBI director
shortDescription: President Donald Trump confirms Kash Patel will remain FBI director amid reports of possible replacement and criticism over resource use.

title: What is President Donald Trump's approval rating? See latest polls.
shortDescription: Donald Trump has long touted his wins on trade and the economy. But voters aren't convinced prices are coming down. What is Trump's approval rating?

title: Trump says Maduro meeting possible
shortDescription: President Trump says he may speak with Venezuela's Maduro amid a pressure campaign on Venezuela that has included a massive U.S. military buildup.

title: Trump says he may talk to Maduro as he pressures Venezuelan leader
shortDescription: The Trump administration's saber-rattling against the longtime adversary has been bolstered by the deployment of military assets near Venezuela.

title: Trump calls Illinois governor a ‘big, fat slob’
shortDescription: President Donald Trump called out Illinois Governor JB Pritzker, saying he needs to get his "act together."

title: 20 states sue to block Trump from restricting homelessness funding
shortDescription: Officials from 20 mostly Democratic-led states and Washington, D.C., claim HUD changes violate federal law and target LGBTQ communities.

title: White House holiday season begins. What is Mar-a-Lago like at Christmas?
shortDescription: First lady Melania Trump welcomed the White House Christmas tree. President Trump pardoned turkeys. It's the holiday season. What is Mar-a-Lago like?

title: Trump says extending ACA insurance subsidies might be 'necessary'
shortDescription: White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt said in a Nov. 25 statement that Trump "is not considering a straight two-year subsidy extension."

title: DC Mayor Muriel Bowser says she will not seek reelection
shortDescription: Muriel Bowser, a Democrat, has served as mayor since 2015 after spending more than a decade in municipal government, including on the city council.

title: White House denies Trump considering ousting FBI Director Kash Patel
shortDescription: Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt posted a picture of President Donald Trump and FBI Director Kash Patel standing next to each other with thumbs up.

title: ¿Qué propone Trump para Obamacare? ¿A quién ayudaría el plan?
shortDescription: Trump impulsa una reforma a Obamacare que enviaría subsidios directamente a los consumidores, no a aseguradoras, mientras millones enfrentan aumentos en 2026.

title: FBI probes 6 Democrats who urged military to refuse 'illegal orders'
shortDescription: The FBI has requested interviews with the six Democrats in Congress who released a video urging military members to disobey "illegal orders."

title: Indiana lawmakers to meet over 2026 voting change at Trump's request
shortDescription: The announcements from both state GOP chambers' leadership keeps President Donald Trump's hopes of redistricting alive in Indiana.

title: Trump plan for ACA on hold after pushback
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's plan for Obamacare subsidies was delayed following Republican pushback.
